divs: sighting detailsi was in my car at 9th and west ave sitting at the light about mid block. i noticed between the telephone\electrical wires and the corner of luigi's restuarant a red light that was wavering slowly back and forth and slowly going up and down to a lesser degree than it was going back and forth. the light turned green and i waited about 3\4th of a light cycle to turn left. i entered the mcdonalds which is on the corner of 9th and west and proceeded to the far side of the parking lot. i parked my car and saw that the red light was still in the sky at approximately the same position it was when i observed it at the light. i watched it for about a minute before it occured to me that i have a camera on my phone. i opened my car door and i took one picture of it. then i remembered that i also have a movie mode on my camera on my phone. i looked down at the phone to switch it to movie mode and looked back up it was gone. i looked away for less than 5 seconds. i do not know what happened to it. the picture is grainy, but it does show the red light and the only reference point is a light pole from the parking lot which was in front of my car in the foreground.
Summary: Solid bright red light making S shaped movement
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ocean City
There were no other sightings in Ocean City on or around August 1st 2012
